The division of the world into four quarters and Cardinal points is a core part of the Copper King believe system, featuring especially prominently on [painted bowls](swastika)  
 ![](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3c/C_Group_bowl.jpg/220px-C_Group_bowl.jpg)

States (multi-institutional, multinational organisations)  

Uruk-period worldview: water enables agriculture and animal husbandry, thus feeding people and providing the means for them to fulfill the main duty of their existence: to feed and care for the gods.
